item.title: Documentation
item.description: This page describes how to edit the documentation you’re currently reading. The whole documentation is located in the directory hugo. Change into this directory. All following commands are supposed to be run from here. cd hugo Requirements Download Hugo binary for your OS (Windows, Linux, Mac). Editing Change files in hugo/content to edit the documentation. See the DocDock documentation for more information on how to organize content. Afterwards, commit your work to your repository.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: Our Pledge In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.
